txt.en: 'We would have lost this place and our lives, [placeholder], had you not provided such valuable assistance during the attack. The Iron Garrison owes you a great deal for your aid in defence of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\n'If you wish to relive the experience of that desperate defence, you should peer into the Reflecting Pool to recollect your memories of that dreadful battle. You might learn something of yourself to bring you strength in battles still to come.'
'I am happy that you have revisited your defence of the Twenty-first Hall, [placeholder]. Only by studying our past can we gain knowledge to aid our future.'
II.5.5 Tale: The Battle of the Twenty-first Hall
Rúnar, a Sage of Moria, has invited you to recollect your experience defending the Twenty-first Hall from attack by Mazog's Orcs.
Peer into the Reflecting Pool and revisit 'The Battle of the Twenty-first Hall'

The Reflecting Pool in the Twenty-first Hall of Moria will allow you to revisit 'The Battle of the Twenty-first Hall.'\n\nA Sage of Moria has challenged you to revisit your defence of the Twenty-first Hall.

Rúnar, a Sage of Moria, can be found in the Twenty-first Hall of Moria.\n\nA Sage of Moria is waiting to speak with you about what you have learned by revisiting your defence of the Twenty-first Hall.
